item.title: CVE-2024-22284|2024-01-24T11:45:18.150Z -- Thomas Belser -- Asgaros Forum
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in Thomas Belser Asgaros Forum.This issue affects Asgaros Forum: from n/a through 2.7.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-32440|2024-04-15T08:04:18.808Z -- Thomas Belser -- Asgaros Forum
